text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated unless the context clearly requires otherwise.
"Appellate court" means the Court of Appeals or the Court of Special Appeals.
"Court" means the court in which the officer serves, but if the officer serves in a district of the District Court it means the District Court for the county or district in which he serves.
"Decree" includes a judgment or order of a court.
"Judge" means the judge of a court in which the officer serves.
"Writ" includes a warrant, process, or summons.
